Desc.entry: An information website of learning disabilities services in Sheffield including information on housing, health, money, work, transport, how to access services, events, leisure, information for carers and much more. The website is for service users, families, carers and staff and has been designed to best enable people with a learning disability to use it. It has icons and a browsealoud facility so information can be read out to people as they use the site.

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
